title: This blog post has a British Accent, lovely.
author: Will Kirkpatrick
blog: Pommy ipsum bread and butter pudding you mean it ain't me noggin' knackered daft cow, a tad wedding tackle balderdash numpty getting on my wick Big Ben, bit of alright codswallop absolute conked him one on the nose. Bit of alright got a lot of brass ridicule numpty Dalek gosh brilliant throw a spanner in the works, done up like a kipper old chap bowler hat Time Lord chaps who brought loaf. Bit of a div good old fashioned knees up could be a bit of a git bloody shambles numbskull, fish and chips gravy cheese and chips I could reet fancy a chippy, owt lass the black death. Gallivanting around middle class well chuffed naff rather chap, middle class a tenner 10 pence mix bargain Betty, a tad brown sauce cottage pie down the local.  Scrote a total jessie codswallop nicked, Victoria sponge cake River Song. Brainbox 'ar kid flip flops slappers down the village green a bottle of plonk and we all like figgy pudding, anorak bow ties are cool how's your father driving a mini chav, got his end away cup of tea I could reet fancy a 10 pence mix on the pull. Chav throw a spanner in the works had a barney with the inlaws have a gander supper, the fuzz chav devonshire cream tea sod's law big light, eton mess plum pudding brainbox. Lost her marbles ee bah gum nonsense we'll be 'avin less of that marmite therewith off t'pub, Elementary my dear Watson collywobbles chaps houlligan one would like Union Jack wibbly-wobbly timey-wimey stuff, 221B Baker Street up North blummin' numbskull real ale.  Pulled out the eating irons eton mess flog a dead horse one off flabbergasted manky is she 'avin a laugh chuffed, fake tan upper class could be a bit of a git scatterbrained a right toff. doing my nut in naff fork out. Her Majesty's pleasure fancy a cuppa round our gaff ey up duck splendid sausage roll complete mare houlligan, jammy git guinness make a brew lad munta. Bad Wolf tip-top scatterbrained the fuzz by 'eck love jolly through the dales cup of tea a diamond geezer it's just not cricket whizz, bargain Betty it's nicked numpty bloody mary Prince Charles the old bill a right corker slap-head.  Porky-pies absobloodylootely Time Lord it's cracking flags, easy peasy it's me peepers. Cotton on on the beat jolly hockey sticks have a gander a total jessie, fake tan ey up duck off the hook. On the pull bottled it throw a spanner in the works rubbish taking the mick, have a gander Dr. Watson Moriarty, a comely wench bit of a div willy. Gallivanting around nowt black pudding wind up gobsmacked ridiculous chips stop arsing around a week on Sunday rather, golly gosh cor blimey' bogroll muck about is she 'avin a laugh Amelia Pond plum pudding.  - See more at: http://www.pommyipsum.com/#sthash.jHMJoc2k.dpuf
